title: Strongly enhanced persulfate activation by bicarbonate accelerated Cu(III)/Cu(I) redox cycles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1785-1794
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00172A, Paper
Jun Zhang, Shenjun Wang, Yuhao Wu, Jiahai Ma
In the PDS/Cu2+ system, bicarbonate can promote the cycling of copper ions with different valence states.
